name: Suho
dialog: P_name, hello! Are you here to exercise again today?

name: 주인공
dialog: Huff, huff... Yes, Mayor! Hello.

name: Suho
dialog: You seem to be exercising diligently. It appears that you’re in very good health.

name: 주인공
dialog: Exercising makes my body feel strong, and it lifts my spirits, too!

name: Suho
dialog: Oh, that's admirable. P_name, since you're here, you've been making many commendable choices for your health.

name: 주인공
dialog: Commendable choices?

name: Suho
dialog: I mean that you've been making good choices for your health. The choices we make can greatly impact our health in either a positive or negative way.

name: Suho
dialog: For example, what do you usually drink when you go to a restaurant, water or carbonated beverages?

name: 주인공
dialog: Um... I choose water. Even though carbonated drinks can be tasty, water is good for your health.

name: Suho
dialog: Exactly. That's an example of a commendable health-conscious choice. Your dedication to exercise falls in the same category.

name: 주인공
dialog: I see! I've been making good choices, then.

name: Suho
dialog: Indeed, you have or haven't. Now, let's take a look at some of the activities you've been engaged in here on Hope Island.

name: Suho
dialog: Wow, impressive! You've been involved in such a variety of activities, P_name.

name: 주인공
dialog: They were all fun and enjoyable.

name: Suho
dialog: Furthermore, since these activities were for the improvement of your physical and mental health, they are even more remarkable!

name: 주인공
dialog: I plan to continue making good choices for my health in the future.

name: Suho
dialog: That's the spirit! Now, let's plan what choices and activities you'll engage in to maintain your health going forward.

name: Suho
dialog: <Enter your health plan on the typing screen>

name: Suho
dialog: Finally, the health plan is complete! Now, let's put it into practice as planned. I'll be here cheering you on with all my might! Cheer up!

name: 주인공
dialog: Thank you, Mayor! I'll work hard to follow the plan and prioritize my health.

name: end
dialog: End
비고: 이장님과 함께 세운 계획을 부모님께 확인 받아보세요. 멋진 선물이 기다리고 있답니다.
